entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a Norwegian Ridgeback, mentioned as a pet of Hagrid.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is a teacher at Hogwarts who seems to be getting paler and thinner.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters who is checking on Fluffy in the third-floor corridor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and is also checking on Fluffy with him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character who is worried about the exams and is making revision timetables.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is sweeping the corridors in his usual bad temper.

entities.name: fluffy
entities.description: Fluffy is a three-headed dog that is being kept in the third-floor corridor.

entities.name: philosopher's stone
entities.description: The Philosopher's Stone is an object that Quirrell and others are trying to protect.

relationships.description: Harry gives Quirrell an encouraging sort of smile whenever he passes him.
Ron has started telling people off for laughing at Quirrell's stutter.
